titleStmt.title: The pilgrimage of princes, penned out of sundry Greeke and Latine aucthours, by Lodovvicke Lloid Gent
titleStmt.author: Lloyd, Lodowick, fl. 1573-1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by [John Charlewood and John Kingston? for] VVilliam Iones, and are to be solde at his nevve long Shop at the vvest doore of Povvles,

notesStmt.note: Printers' names and publication date conjectured by STC.
"Copies occur with minor variations in quires ** and A"--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: his nevve long Shop at the vvest doore of Povvles
